Name: SamboHead
Notes: A green flower enemy that hides in the ground and hops out if the player is nearby. It hops towards the player to damage them. It can be defeated by most of the player's attack. If the player is too far away, it will hide in the ground again.

Obj_arg0.Name: Doesn't Hide Again?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it won't hide in the ground when the player is too far away from it.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will only come out of the ground if this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.
